participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Ella loves to share her stories and dreams with others.
participant_1.background: i'm in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and creative, Sarah enjoys planning fun activities for her family and friends.
participant_2.background: i am expecting triplets in three months. i recently moved to this country. i already have a step children. i work at a school.

content.text: And, Frank, Bill, Wally, y'all harmonize like the best barbershop quartet, and there's only three of you.
